description.en_US: The action is used for publish output message into an MQTT server.
description.zh_CN: 该操作用于将输出消息发布到 MQTT 服务器中

hint.en_US: The broker address of the MQTT server, such as tcp://127.0.0.1:1883.
hint.zh_CN: MQTT 服务器地址，例如 tcp://127.0.0.1:1883

hint.en_US: The MQTT topic, such as analysis/result
The client id for MQTT connection. If not specified, an uuid will be used
hint.zh_CN: MQTT 连接的客户端 ID。 如果未指定，将使用一个 uuid

hint.en_US: MQTT protocol version. 3.1 (also refer as MQTT 3) or 3.1.1 (also refer as MQTT 4).  If not specified, the default value is 3.1.
hint.zh_CN: MQTT 协议版本。3.1 (也被称为 MQTT 3) 或者 3.1.1 (也被称为 MQTT 4)。 如果未指定，缺省值为 3.1。

hint.en_US: The certification path. It can be an absolute path, or a relative path. If it is an relative path, then the base path is where you excuting the kuiperd command. For example, if you run bin/kuiperd from /var/kuiper, then the base path is /var/kuiper; If you run ./kuiperd from /var/kuiper/bin, then the base path is /var/kuiper/bin.
hint.zh_CN: 证书路径。可以为绝对路径，也可以为相对路径。如果指定的是相对路径，那么父目录为执行 kuiperd 命令的路径。比如，如果你在 /var/kuiper 中运行 bin/kuiperd ，那么父目录为 /var/kuiper; 如果运行从 /var/kuiper/bin 中运行./kuiperd，那么父目录为 /var/kuiper/bin

hint.en_US: The private key path. It can be either absolute path, or relative path, which is similar to use of certificationPath.
hint.zh_CN: 私钥路径。可以为绝对路径，也可以为相对路径，相对路径的用法与 certificationPath 类似

hint.en_US: If InsecureSkipVerify is true, TLS accepts any certificate presented by the server and any host name in that certificate.  In this mode, TLS is susceptible to man-in-the-middle attacks. The default value is false. The configuration item can only be used with TLS connections.
hint.zh_CN: 如果 InsecureSkipVerify 设置为 true, TLS接受服务器提供的任何证书以及该证书中的任何主机名。 在这种模式下，TLS容易受到中间人攻击。默认值为false。配置项只能用于TLS连接。
